author: potuz
content: <@520034910149410861> This is the minimal change I had in mind to track that bit, I just opened a draft cause I want to have a link for the annotated spec. I think as is it's minimally invasive even with regards to your PR for variable timeliness. https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4884

author: jtraglia
content: <@&1417820113981145228> we have merged the PR which moves the blob KZG commitments to the bid & started the nightly reference tests action ([`nightly-21532588385`](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/actions/runs/21532588385)). Over the weekend, I will try to implement these changes in a client to confirm that the specs are correct. At ACDT on Monday, if it's confirmed that we want to move the commitments to the bid, we will immediately start the release process for `v1.7.0-alpha.2` and it should be ready ~18 hours later.
